response.original_title: The Bakersfield 3: A Tale of Murder and Motherhood
response.overview: In the spring of 2018, a young woman and man went missing, and another young man was murdered in Bakersfield, California. A string of coincidences unearthed by the victims' mothers led to the realization that these three cases were entangled.
response.title: The Bakersfield 3: A Tale of Murder and Motherhood
